name: HeroCore
description:
Create a Hero, selecting class, race and specialization. Gain spending points to upgrade your hero to suit your play style and goals. Purchase items in several catagories to become more lethal. Use your Hero across a variety of maps, ranging from campaign, to PvP, to all out war. CUSTOMIZATION FEATURES (some pending)
\-12 classes, 10 races, 2 specializations per class.
\-5-7 ability options per class, each with multiple levels (144 total).
\-5 Hero attributes to increase your Hero's base stats.
\-compete inventory with overlapping item types and subtypes.
\-open ended spending options, allowing unique Heros to develop, especially at higher levels.
\-texture selection options and custom models. GAMEPLAY FEATURES
\-interactable terrain, including "doors", gates and bridges.
\-destructable terrain objects.
\-ability based combat modification.
\-optional day/night cycles.
\-hazardous terrain and traps. TO DO
\-actually finish abilities
\-balancing
\-custom models with texture selections.
author: _ForgeUser9052497
